::KitKat::

She was in the chamber and still out cold. She mumbled while asleep 
in the chamber,"Land Mine.....noo..don't 
sacrifice....yourself...don't..."mumble"  She mumbled as she slept.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit woke up in the CR tank, he was in beast mode. The 
combination
> of the CR fluid, and the internal repairs, got him fixed up fast. He
> climbed out of the tank.
> "DrillBit, terrorize." He transformed, to bot mode. He spoted 
KitKat,
> next to the tank. He carefuly picked her up, and placed her into the
> tank.
> "Get well." he said, more to himself, then her. He stayed waiting 
for
> her to awake.
